name: Just Floating Around
description:
You are stationed at an ISS when suddenly, an alarm goes on. 

Help Echo tell their story. 

This is a very short visual novel made for the O2A2 game jam. 

Credits
  • Art & Backgrounds - Melisa Gumbs
  • Writing -  MIAAn
  •  Programming & UI - Claudia Groot
  • Voice Acting -  Haidy Knox
  •  Music - Deep Blue by Bensound.com
  • Vector Art - Vecteezy.com
